body.p: OBS Studio needs to authenticate with a 3CLogic server before allowing the Customer Support Agents to use the software.
The software must first verify Agents’ identity or establish a connection with a 3CLogic server.

li.p: Login or Authentication – The Agent may need to enter credentials or go through a verification process.
Permission Check – A 3CLogic server ensures that the Customer Support Agent is authorized to use OBS Studio for specific tasks.
Secure Connection – OBS Studio may need to link with 3CLogic to access certain features, such as streaming, recording, or integrating with customer support tools.

note.p: For precise information on setting up and authenticating OBS Studio with 3CLogic server, it's advisable to consult 3CLogic's IT services documentation or reach out to their IT help desk on abc@c3logic.com.
